name: minotaur (itch) (theVincenator)
description:
A 2D old school labyrinth runner using Löve2D. You start in one corner of the maze and try to get to the opposite corner. As you go deeper and deeper, the labyrinth grows. Don't get caught by the minotaur.

In this one I tested maze generation algorithms and GLSL.  Inspired from a friend's project in our High School computer science class.

Controls:space: start game

  • arrowkeys: move
  • r: restart
  • m: toggle mute
  • f: toggle fullscreen
  • s: toggle shader
  • 1-9: scaling factor
